akn:section.akn:heading: Payment of fees on departing vessel

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 60107. Payment of fees on departing vessel A departing vessel may be cleared only when all legal fees that have accrued on the vessel are paid and proof of payment is presented to the individual granting the clearance. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 9(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1676.)
